name: Labyrinthilium
description:
Almost all of demonkind has been banished to a place beyond the world.

As one of these demons, and a demon lord at that, you're none too happy about that.
...but is there even a way out? And even if there was, would you be able to conquer the myriad demons who now seek your defeat?
___________
This is a 3D dungeon crawler in the vein of Etrian Odyssey, originally made for the HOTOHR 2016 contest. I'm not going to return to this in particular, but consider it a prototype for a future project I might dive into at some point.

Features:

- Experience an extremely old-school 1st-person dungeon crawl, with three floors in all.

- Take the skills of your enemies and use them yourself! Master the skill fragment system and bring a host of new skills to bear on your former allies.

- Learn the ins and outs of a streamlined, auto-targeting turn-based battle system.
___________

[All but one song taken from 7th Dragon, with the last taken from Kyuuyaku Megami Tensei.]
